column4: Hey guys. I am having alot of trouble with my grub. I've had a few people previouslly post links but nothing is working and frankly I don't know what I'm doing. Yes, I admit it but I need help. Real help. anyone up for it?
best to just ask the channel your actual question (on a single line)
I have no grub Jordan_U I'm jt13 you gave me a link and even following those directions to a t i get errors and can't get it right
you're being too vague for anyone to know how to help you I suspect
